alert.note: Alert for Brown; Campbell; McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 9:10PM MST until January 05 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Blowing and drifting snow. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Campbell, McPherson and Brown Counties. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
